name: ProtoGun
description:
"SAVE THEM"

  • A classic NES style bullet-hell with.. "classical" NES difficulty.
  • Whopping 4 guns to pick up and use!
  • A monstrous... single stage to complete!
  • A mysterious boss to reach and conquer!
  • A non-functioning high-score system! Exercise your memory!
  • Controllable volume from the options menu! This is the cutting edge!
  • AN OPTIONS MENU!!1! *(Some options do not do anything)

Keypad and Keyboard controls supported:

  • WASD to move + Space to Accept/Shoot
  • DPAD to move + XBox(A) Nintendo (B) Button to Accept/Shoot

Pick up guns by walking over their pickups... or ignore them for added challenge.


This is my entry into the #retrogradejam Game Jam, made in the lovely Godot engine.
As a consequence of being a game jam entry, and a shorter jam at that, it's gonna be a little rough around the edges, but I hope you enjoy your time nevertheless <3

< CREDITS >:
